name: Meringue
ingredients: 1/4 tsp cream of tartar and almond extract
instructions: For meringue in a small mixer beat egg whites, cream of tartar and extract on medium speed until soft peaks form (tips curl).
Gradually add sugar, beating on high until stiff peaks form (tips stand straight).
Spoon into decorating bag fitted with a star tip.
On a lightly greased cookie sheet pipe some of the meringue into 24 rounds, each about 1 1/4‚Äù in diameter.
Press chocolate kiss into each meringue round.
Pipe meringue around each kiss in concentric circles, starting at base and working toward top, till kiss is completely covered.
Bake at 325 for 20-25 minutes or until light brown n the edges.
Immediately remove from cookie sheet; cool on wire rack.
